description: This file defines API endpoints related to managing 'skills' in a learning platform, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, deleting skills, and listing modules associated with a skill. It uses FastAPI for routing and SQLAlchemy for database interactions.

methods.name: list_skills( subject_slug: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by subject slug (topic)"), level: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by progression level: Beginner|Intermediate|Advanced"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Retrieve a list of skills, optionally filtered by subject slug and progression level.

methods.name: create_skill(payload: SkillCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Create a new skill after validating subject existence and slug uniqueness.

methods.name: get_skill(skill_slug: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Fetch detailed information about a specific skill by its slug.

methods.name: update_skill(skill_slug: str, updates: Dict[str, Any], db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Update attributes of an existing skill identified by slug.

methods.name: delete_skill(skill_slug: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Soft delete a skill by marking its 'deleted' field as True.

methods.name: list_modules_for_skill(skill_slug: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: List modules associated with a specific skill identified by slug.

ctags.name: list_skills
ctags.signature: ( subject_slug: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by subject slug (topic)"), level: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by progression level: Beginner|Intermediate|Advanced"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: update_skill
ctags.pattern: /^def update_skill(skill_slug: str, updates: Dict[str, Any], db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (skill_slug: str, updates: Dict[str, Any], db: Session = Depends(get_db))
